title: DirektDSP Audio Plugins
description: Professional-grade VST/AU plugins for modern music production. High-performance audio effects with real-time DSP processing, built with C++ and JUCE framework.

title: Custom Operating System
description: A from-scratch operating system written in C and Assembly. Features custom kernel, memory management, and basic system calls for educational purposes.

title: Juno Project Generator
description: Desktop application for rapidly generating JUCE audio plugin projects with customizable templates, built-in project management, and CMake integration.

title: Candlz Trading Platform
description: Real-time trading simulation platform with algorithmic trading capabilities, live market data integration, and comprehensive backtesting tools.

title: Ampere App Template
description: Cross-platform application template combining Electron frontend with Python FastAPI backend. Includes CLI tools and npm package distribution.

title: Game Engine from Scratch
description: Custom 2D game engine built with C++ and OpenGL. Features sprite rendering, physics simulation, audio system, and scene management.

title: Music Production Suite
description: Collection of original music tracks produced in FL Studio and Ableton. Spanning EDM, electronica, and indie rock genres with professional mixing.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Modern, responsive portfolio website built with Vue.js, TypeScript, and Vite. Features dynamic theming, blog functionality, and project showcases.
